content: Do not deviate from the plan - if you think you need to deviate, STOP and ask the user for guidance

The subagent should STOP work here and return control to you and you should then continue with the following
Task a new subagent to do a code review of the changes in the worktree - tell it to focus on identifying duplication and complexity
When this new subagent returns, STOP and review the suggested changes with the user
